rows.label: qst700301_msg0001
rows.name:
Travelers... Would you be
willing to hear my story?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0002
rows.name:
The lantern in front of the
gate... its light has gone out...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0003
rows.name: Doesn't that bother you?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0004
rows.name: Does the unlit lantern bother you?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0005
rows.name: It does.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0006
rows.name: It doesn't.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0007
rows.name: Right? It does bother you.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0008
rows.name:
You'd want to fix it if
you could, wouldn't you?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0009
rows.name: It doesn't bother you!?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0010
rows.name:
You're just like my brother.
Saying it's fine as it is...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0011
rows.name: Still, please hear me out.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0012
rows.name:
I cannot neglect this guard
duty for even a single moment.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0013
rows.name:
The guard next to me... is my
brother, but for certain reasons,
I'd rather not rely on him.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0014
rows.name:
Well, if you talk to him, I
think you'll understand what
kind of person he is...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0015
rows.name:
In any case, I must watch
this place diligently.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0016
rows.name:
But if I focus on my watch, I
can't repair the lantern...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0017
rows.name: Do you understand my situation?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0018
rows.name:
You'll help me repair
the lantern, won't you?

rows.label: qst700301_msg0101
rows.name:
Please repair the lantern
in front of the gate.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0102
rows.name:
I don't think it'll be too
difficult. You'll all be fine.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0103
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0201
rows.name:
I was watching, you know.
Your brilliant performance.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0202
rows.name:
The light is lit, and my
watch has become easier.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0203
rows.name: Now I can rest easy...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0204
rows.name: Or so you thought.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0205
rows.name:
Actually, there are a few other
broken lanterns like this one
throughout the capital.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0206
rows.name:
I found them while
patrolling the capital.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0207
rows.name:
But, as usual, I can't
consult my brother.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0208
rows.name:
If he knew, he'd take the initiative
and fix them all by himself...

rows.label: qst700301_msg0209
rows.name:
However, I have my duty to
guard this gate and have
no time to repair them.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0210
rows.name:
There were four in total, I believe...
Near the Formide Shopping Ward and
the Fabri Industry Ward.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0211
rows.name:
Also in the Aurium Residential
Ward and the Orem Storage Ward.

rows.label: qst700301_msg0212
rows.name:
It would be a great help if you could
repair those lanterns as well. For
the residents of the capital, too.
